Class NodeKnob

Abstract knob on the side of an node that handles positioning drawing with a texture and even labeling and positioning calls

GetScriptableObjects()

Returns all additional ScriptableObjects this NodeKnob holds. That means only the actual SOURCES, simple REFERENCES will not be returned This means all SciptableObjects returned here do not have it's source elsewhere

Declaration
